attributes.action: CPHU - Civilised People's Hospitality Unit. People's party. equality for all
attributes.additional_details: We need more than just a parliamentary vote. We are the people. We need a new formed government so please support this cause for the hearts of every soul. Don't lose out. This is for all, don't just sign; be the sign. We need your support. Sign the petition as soon as possible.
attributes.background: This is a government that will grow for the people and listen for the people. This is going to be the voices of the voiceless. This party will listen to all human beings and create new grounds, an equal party that will go for great human right causes.
